name: Ralph ROMAN, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Ralph ROMAN, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of May, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
43 A.3d 1286
Ralph ROMAN, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 10 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 7, 2012.
